Question: This person also completed several projects in the Los Angeles area.
Hints: Between 1900 and 1901, this person completed four houses which have since been considered the onset of the "Prairie style".
His third wife, Olgivanna, ran the Fellowship after this person's death, until her own death in Scottsdale, Arizona, in 1985.
This person had risen to head draftsman and handled all residential design work in the office.
